with DonorInfo as ( select bbis.ID, item.value('FIELD[1]', 'nvarchar(255)') as FieldName, item.value('NEWVALUE[1]', 'nvarchar(255)') as Value from dbo.BATCHBBNCDONATION bbis inner join dbo.BATCH b on bbis.BATCHID = b.ID cross apply bbis.DONORINFORMATIONALLFIELDS.nodes ('/DONORINFORMATIONALLFIELDS/ITEM') t(item) where batchnumber like 'W%' ), DonorAddressInformation as (select bbis.ID, item.value('FIELD[1]', 'nvarchar(255)') as FieldName, item.value('NEWVALUE[1]', 'nvarchar(255)') as Value from dbo.BATCHBBNCDONATION bbis inner join dbo.BATCH b on bbis.BATCHID = b.ID cross apply bbis.DONORADDRESSINFORMATIONALLFIELDS.nodes ('/DONORADDRESSINFORMATIONALLFIELDS/ITEM') t(item) where BATCHNUMBER like 'W%' ) , GiftInformation as (select bbis.ID, item.value('FIELD[1]', 'nvarchar(255)') as FieldName, item.value('NEWVALUE[1]', 'nvarchar(255)') as Value from dbo.BATCHBBNCDONATION bbis inner join dbo.BATCH b on bbis.BATCHID = b.ID cross apply bbis.GIFTINFORMATION.nodes ('/GIFTINFORMATION/ITEM') t(item) where BATCHNUMBER like 'W%' ), GiftAttributeInformation as (select bbis.ID, item.value('FIELD[1]', 'nvarchar(255)') as FieldName, item.value('NEWVALUE[1]', 'nvarchar(255)') as Value from dbo.BATCHBBNCDONATION bbis inner join dbo.BATCH b on bbis.BATCHID = b.ID cross apply bbis.GIFTATTRIBUTEINFORMATION.nodes ('/GIFTATTRIBUTEINFORMATION/ITEM') t(item) where BATCHNUMBER like 'W%' )
select bbis.ID, b.ID BATCHID, bbis.DONORID as MATCHEDCONSTITUENTID, b.BATCHNUMBER, bbis.SEQUENCE, c.LOOKUPID as MATCHEDCONSTITUENTLOOKUPID, c.NAME as MATCHEDCONSTITUENTNAME, firstname.Value as FIRSTNAME, lastname.Value as LASTNAME, donoraddress.Value as DONORADDRESS, donorcity.Value as DONORCITY, donorstate.Value as DONORSTATE, donorpostcode.Value as DONORPOSTCODE, donorcountry.Value as DONORCOUNTRY, giftamount.Value as GIFTAMOUNT, giftdate.Value as GIFTDATE, giftpaymentmethod.Value as PAYMENTMETHOD, giftnameoncard.Value as NAMEONCARD, giftcardtype.Value as CARDTYPE, giftcardexp.Value as EXPDATE, rgfrequency.Value as RGFREQUENCY, rgday.Value as RGDAY, rgfinancialinstitution.Value as FINANCIALINSTITUTION, rg1stpaymentprocessed.Value as RGPROCESSEDFIRSTPAYMENT, giftcomment.Value as GIFTCOMMENT, giftcorporate.Value as CORPORATEGIFT, bbis.ORIGINPAGE, bbis.DONORIDAUTOMATCH, giftattrsponsorid.Value as ATTRIBUTESPONSORID, giftattrchildid.Value as ATTRIBUTECHILDID, case when giftattrsponsorid.Value is null then 'no sponsor id attribute' when giftattrsponsorid.Value = c.LOOKUPID then 'Sponsor ID attribute is the same as matched constituent' else 'Sponsor ID attribute is NOT the same as matched constituent' end as SPONSORIDATTRIBUTEMATCH, case when giftattrchildid.Value is null then 'no child id attribute' when s.ID is not null then 'Matched constituent sponsors child in attribute' when bbis.DONORID is null then 'not matched' else 'Matched constituent does NOT sponsor child listed in attribute' end as CHILDIDATTRIBUTEMATCH
from dbo.BATCHBBNCDONATION bbis inner join dbo.BATCH b on bbis.BATCHID = b.ID left join DonorInfo firstname on firstname.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (firstname.FieldName,'') = 'First name' left join DonorInfo lastname on lastname.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce(lastname.FieldName,'') = 'Last name' left join DonorAddressInformation donoraddress on donoraddress.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (donoraddress.FieldName, '') = 'Address' left join DonorAddressInformation donorcity on donorcity.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (donorcity.FieldName, '') = 'City' left join DonorAddressInformation donorstate on donorstate.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (donorstate.FieldName, '') = 'State' left join DonorAddressInformation donorpostcode on donorpostcode.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (donorpostcode.FieldName, '') = 'Post code' left join DonorAddressInformation donorcountry on donorcountry.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (donorcountry.FieldName, '') = 'Country' left join GiftInformation giftamount on giftamount.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (giftamount.FieldName, '') = 'Amount' left join GiftInformation giftdate on giftdate.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (giftdate.FieldName, '') = 'Date' left join GiftInformation giftpaymentmethod on giftpaymentmethod.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (giftpaymentmethod.FieldName, '') = 'Payment method' left join GiftInformation giftnameoncard on giftnameoncard.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (giftnameoncard.FieldName, '') = 'Name on card' left join GiftInformation giftcardtype on giftcardtype.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (giftcardtype.FieldName, '') = 'Card type' left join GiftInformation giftcardexp on giftcardexp.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (giftcardexp.FieldName, '') = 'Expires on' left join GiftInformation giftcomment on giftcomment.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (giftcomment.FieldName, '') = 'Comments' left join GiftInformation rgfinancialinstitution on rgfinancialinstitution.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (rgfinancialinstitution.FieldName, '') = 'Financial institution' left join GiftInformation rgfrequency on rgfrequency.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (rgfrequency.FieldName, '') = 'Frequency'
left join GiftInformation rgday on rgday.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (rgday.FieldName, '') = 'Day' left join GiftInformation rg1stpaymentprocessed on rg1stpaymentprocessed.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (rg1stpaymentprocessed.FieldName, '') = 'First payment processed' left join GiftInformation giftcorporate on giftcorporate.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (giftcorporate.FieldName, '') = 'Corporate gift' left join GiftAttributeInformation giftattrsponsorid on giftattrsponsorid.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (giftattrsponsorid.FieldName, '') = 'BBNC Sponsorship Payment Sponsor ID' left join GiftAttributeInformation giftattrchildid on giftattrchildid.ID = bbis.ID and coalesce (giftattrchildid.FieldName, '') = 'BBNC Sponsorship Payment Child ID' left join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on bbis.DONORID = c.ID left join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on c.ID = s.CONSTITUENTID and s.STATUSCODE = 1 and s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID in (select ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY where LOOKUPID = upper(giftattrchildid.Value))
